tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Doctor Hemant was very friendly. I felt Consultation charge of Rs.2000 for only 3 minutes, was high as the problem was just a thumb pain, nothing  complicated or serious. Besides, even the prescription was a pain killer (which I did not need) plus Uprise D3 which I am already taking,  except that I now had to take it more frequently.  But there was no immediate treatment for the thumb problem.
reply_text:
I don‚Äôt give unnecessary plaster and splint when it is not required
You have minor sprain with good movement of the thumb it will get better with time
Often vitamin deficiency delays the healing process
My consultation charges are same as per advertised on the site

Oh !  he is so comforting and frank , so don‚Äôt Think of an option you have to do it or not it‚Äôs your opinion But he lays-the facts very clearly in front of you

Go for him!!!!

review: Dr Bhandari was recommended to me by a close friend of mine and I‚Äôm so glad to have got operated by him. He is very friendly, down to earth and extremely approachable. Even though he is very busy and is one of the best at what he does, he cares about each and every patient of his personally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been to Doctor Bhandari a couple of times now, most recently for pain in my Neck / shoulder region after a fall while playing. I have had a great experience with the consultations. He is patient, hears you out, asks you questions which make things clearer for you, does a complete physical examination, recognises what could the issues be, explains them to you and recommends the necessary steps to rectify and correct the ongoing issue. Advises tests / x-rays / mri's if needed/not needed. 

Been to 3/4 other orthopaedics over the last decade, by far my experience with Dr. Hemant Bhandari has been the best.

review:
There was no waiting time when I entered the clinic. Hygiene and social distancing were maintained at the clinic. The doctors was very welcoming. Heard me out completely and explained to me the various possibilities of why my problem was occurring. 
Prescribed more tests and clearly dominated the rationale as to why those tests were needed. 
Overall quite satisfied. 
In and out of the clinic in 15 minutes with no waiting time !
reply_text: Thanks. We are maintaining appointment system and social distancing due to pandemic
